routing.title: Number Routing
routing.headline: Configure which phone numbers will route calls to which HTTP URLs for call handling.
routing.pingSuccess: A request was sent to this Pivot Action successfully!

debug.title: Live Debug
debug.headline: Below is a list of recent calls that triggered requests to your HTTP server. Click "View Details" to see what we sent to you, and how your server replied to us.

detailDialog.title: It looks like this call took {{variable}} different step(s). You can navigate through the different requests and responses for each step by clicking on the arrows below
detailDialog.noResponse: Pivot did not detect any Response for this Request
